title: The [French-man] and the Spaniard, or, [The two great lights] of the world, displayed in lively [characters] representing the antipathy of their humours and different dispositions [with an impartiall survey] of the customes of both those nations / by R.G., Gent.

notes: Translation of: Oposicion y conjuncion de los dos grandes luminares de la tierra.
